entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18 except minus 13 along parts of the coast. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 18 except minus 13 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9 except minus 5 south of Hare Bay. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 9 except minus 5 south of Hare Bay. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 17 except minus 10 south of Hare Bay.
